New Records: The Oklahoma City Thunder set a franchise record with their 15th straight win.
Key Match Events: The Thunder clamped down defensively in the second half to beat the Celtics 105-92.
For the fourth straight game, the Thunder won after trailing by at least a dozen points.
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights mentioned in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections mentioned in the article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points in the win.
Others: The Thunder's 105-92 victory over the Celtics marked their 15th consecutive win.
